input.sentences: making the perfect meal requires a lot of chopping | my mom taught me that .
it also takes a lot of marinating | you really can never go wrong with it .
fresh ingredients are a must | and cleaning after yourself is necessary .
i cooked it on a nice prepped heating service . careful not to overcook .
and wow | that is my perfect meal for 4th of july !
output.sentences: I was taught making a perfect dish requires a lot of effort.
Marinating takes time and you can't get this step wrong.
You have to get all the cleaning done and make sure ingredients are fresh.
Good food service requires the meat is well prepared and not overcooked.
Making the meal perfect is sure to wow anyone who eats it.
